item.title: Elden Ring: How To Get All Gestures In Shadow Of The Erdtree
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How To Get The Ring Of Miquella Gesture In Elden Ring
  • How To Get The May The Best One Win Gesture In Elden Ring
  • How To Get The O Mother Gesture In Elden Ring
  • How To Get The Two Fingers Gesture In Elden Ring
  • How To Get The Let Us Go Together Gesture In Elden Ring

In Elden Ring , gestures are forms of non-verbal communication that you can use to interact with other players and NPCs. While most gestures are used to express certain emotions, offer direction, or simply taunt other players in PVP, there are a few gestures that tend to have gameplay implications. For instance, performing the Erudition gesture in the Fringe Converted Tower dispels the magic spell blocking entry into the tower.

In the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC, the game introduces five new gestures , and two of them have gameplay implications. If you're trying to acquire everything that the expansion has to offer, you should not miss out on collecting these five gestures, and here's how you get them all.

How To Get The Ring Of Miquella Gesture In Elden Ring

If you pre-ordered the Shadow of the Erdtree DLC, you will have already acquired the Ring of Miquella gesture upon launching the game after downloading the DLC. However, if you didn't pre-order the game, you can still acquire the gesture by defeating a DLC boss along with another player who pre-ordered the DLC .

You can also complete a co-op session with strangers and acquire the gesture as a reward. Again, the condition still applies, and the gesture is only rewarded if the stranger has already pre-ordered the game. This strategy will not work if your friend or the stranger in a co-op session also acquired the Ring of Miquella gesture through the method discussed.

How To Get The May The Best One Win Gesture In Elden Ring

The May the Best One Win gesture can be picked up near the Highroad Cross Site of Grace . There are two ways you can reach this Site of Grace:

  • Make your way to Castle Ensis and clear this legacy dungeon by defeating Rellana, Twin Moon Knight. You'll discover the Highroad Cross Site of Grace when exiting the dungeon .
  • If you choose to skip Castle Ensis, you can use an alternate route to reach Fort Reprimand and then make your way through Moorth Ruins to discover the Highroad Cross Site of Grace.

The gesture is on the ground near the NPC Hornsent and Needle Knight Leda . You also acquire a note titled Monk's Missive that provides you with vague details on where you must use this gesture.

How To Get The O Mother Gesture In Elden Ring

The O Mother is another gesture with gameplay implications, as it unlocks the path to a secret area in the mid-game . The gesture is located near a statue of Marika in the Bonny Village. To acquire this gesture, you must first discover the Moorth Ruins Site of Grace , which can be reached by following the road from the Highroad Cross Site of Grace and taking the fork in the road to ride south.

Once you're at the ruins, head east to find a caved-in section that leads you underground. Carefully descend to the bottom of the ruins to find a tunnel leading you in the southeastern direction. Following this tunnel, you'll find a ladder that takes you to the Bonny Village.

Discover the Bonny Village Site of Grace and then ride northeast across the broken bridge to discover the O Mother gesture by the headless statue of Marika under a withered tree. You must perform this gesture near the Shadow Keep Back Gate Site of Grace to gain access to a secret area in the expansion.

How To Get The Two Fingers Gesture In Elden Ring

To find the Two Finger Gesture, you'll need to reach the Hinterlands, which can be accessed after using the O Mother gesture. You must then discover the Hinterlands Site of Grace and ride east into the Finger Ruins of Dheo . After a short ride past the Fingercreepers, turn north, and ride all the way to the end of the cliff.

Here, you'll find a hornsent corpse performing the Two Fingers gesture. Interact with the corpse to pick up the gesture. Navigating the Finger Ruins can be challenging, so be sure to use the map featured in the above image for reference.

How To Get The Let Us Go Together Gesture In Elden Ring

The Let Us Go Together gesture can be acquired when fighting the final boss in the DLC . At some point during the fight, the boss will grab you and put a spell on you. If this happens twice during the fight, you'll die instantly , and the next time when you spawn at the Site of Grace, you'll be rewarded with the Let Us Go Together gesture .

However, if you manage to defeat the boss without being grabbed, you can return to the boss's arena after the fight to find the gesture as an item on the ground .

item.title: Fable and Gears of War: E-Day Release Date Rumors Explained
item.description:
Highlights

  • Xbox wowed fans with 30 announcements during its 2024 showcase, including a surprising Gears of War prequel E-Day reveal.
  • Recent rumors hint at Xbox's strong 2025 line-up, with both Fable and Gears of War: E-Day potentially launching that year.
  • While Fable has a confirmed 2025 release date, Gears of War: E-Day's release is uncertain, as The Coalition may need more time.

Xbox knocked it out of the park with its June showcase. Lasting just over an hour, Xbox's 2024 Showcase included 30 major announcements, reveals, and updates. While fans assumed Xbox would show off games like Fable , Indiana Jones and the Great Circle , and Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 , there were plenty of announcements that took fans completely by surprise, and Gears of War: E-Day was one such reveal.

While many presumed The Coalition was working on a new Gears of War game, its potential reveal during 2024's Xbox Showcase was relatively unexpected, and hardly anyone would have guessed the project would be a prequel. Gears of War: E-Day 's announcement took many by surprise, and the trailer's pitch-perfect tone set the game off on the right foot. With the likes of Gears of War: E-Day now on its side, Xbox has a very strong line-up ahead of it, and some recent rumors suggest that line-up could appear sooner than expected.

A Breakdown of Fable and Gears of War: E-Day's Release Date Rumors

Fable and Gears of War: E-Day Could Both Launch in 2025

Soon after the Xbox Showcase aired back in June, The Verge's Tom Warren took to the internet to his Notepad newsletter with some insider information. According to Warren, Microsoft is "currently targeting Fable to release between October and December 2025." With a 2025 release date confirmed in its most recent trailer, Warren's statement about Fable 's release date seems like it could be true, though it's always worth noting that every rumor and leak should be taken with a pinch of salt, especially when it comes to video game release dates.

In that same report, Tom Warren mentioned that, according to his sources, Gears of War: E-Day is also "targeting a release in 2025," apparently "ahead of even Fable ." This comment would suggest that Gears of War: E-Day could come out sometime between Summer and Fall, with Fable coming out a little while later between Fall and Holiday 2025.

If these comments end up being true, 2025 could be one of the greatest years in Xbox history. Xbox's 2025 line-up already has some pretty big games confirmed, with South of Midnight , Doom: The Dark Ages , and now Fable all slated for release next year. And if Gears of War: E-Day joins that line-up, it could be an incredibly exciting year for Xbox fans.

Gears of War: E-Day's Release Date Is Far From Locked Down

While Fable now has a confirmed 2025 release date, Gears of War: E-Day doesn't. The Verge's Tom Warren also commented on this, stating that Microsoft may be giving The Coalition "some breathing room." With no concrete release date, it's more than possible that Gears of War: E-Day won't be in players' hands by the end of 2025, even if Warren's statements about Xbox targeting a 2025 release window are true.

Developing games is incredibly difficult, and that's especially true for a project as big as Gears of War: E-Day . It's more than likely that The Coalition will eventually require more time to complete the game, and if/when that happens, Xbox's internal targets for its release window will probably change. Though that'll be disappointing for Gears of Wars fans, it would be a smart move in the long run, as there's a lot of pressure on The Coalition to get it right with E-Day .

item.title: Roblox: Neighbors Codes (July 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Neighbors Codes
  • How to Redeem Neighbors Codes

Neighbors is a game on the Roblox platform that will let you engage in communication and interaction with other players. It works like a chat roulette, but in addition to that, you will also visit other users in their in-game home. By using Neighbors codes, you can get some credits and skins that will help you create your own style so that you are welcomed into every house. This is essential because, for some reason, most players do not want to communicate with those who have a "noob" skin.

Updated July 15, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: With this update, we added one new code. Hurry and redeem them to get some Credits improve your gameplay experience.

All Neighbors Codes

The first impression of a person is formed in a few seconds based on their behavior, external features, and appearance. In this game, you meet a random player and, of course, the first thing they notice is your appearance. You can be kicked out for looking bad even before you write anything, so use codes to be stylish and avoid being alone from the very beginning of the game.

All Active Neighbors Codes (July 2024)

  • 200MILLION - Redeem this code to get 170 Credits. (NEW)
  • TREASURE - Redeem this code to get 150 Credits.
  • RECESS - Redeem this code to get 100 Credits.
  • ILOVEBOOGLE - Redeem this code to get 120 Credits.

Expired Codes (July 2024)

  • 20K
  • HOP
  • SHAMROCK
  • WINTER23
  • HOLIDAYCUT
  • 10KMEMBERS
  • 17+RELEASE
  • AUTUMN2
  • FRIDAY13
  • ILOVEBOOGLE
  • LABORDAY2023
  • NEIGHBORS50MILLION
  • PUBLICTEST1
  • THANKSGIVING23
  • WOOSH

How to Redeem Neighbors Codes

Redeeming codes in Neighbors is not a long or complicated process, as opposed to some other games on the Roblox platform. Here, you can do it as soon as you enter the game. Here are instructions for those who don't know how to redeem codes:

  • Launch Neighbors .
  • Pay attention to the upper-right corner of the screen. Here, you will notice several buttons with different icons.
  • Among them, you need to find and interact with the first one with the key icon.
  • After doing so, you will open a new menu interface where you can redeem the codes. There will be two interactive options: an input field, and a Submit button.
  • Select the code you want to redeem and enter it in the input field. It is recommended to copy and paste the code to avoid typos when entering it manually.
  • When the code is entered, click the Submit button to complete the reward request.
  • If successful, you will see a green notification at the top of the screen.

If you do not see this notification, the code you want to redeem may have expired. In such cases, you can't get the rewards that the code provides. To avoid this in the future, redeem active codes as soon as possible, both in this and other Roblox games you play.

item.title: All Dungeon Locations in Palworld
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Forgotten Island & Ice Wind Island
  • Bamboo Groves
  • Sea Breeze Archipelago
  • Moonless Shore
  • Windswept Hills
  • Frostbound Mountains & Verdant Brook
  • Marsh Island & Eastern Wild Island
  • Dessicated Desert
  • Land Of Absolute Zero
  • Sakurajima Island
  • Mount Obsidian

Palworld offers Pal catching fun, base-building mechanics, and a wide-open world filled with many beautiful locations. Gamers diving into Palworld have the freedom to play exactly how they want, from catching the most powerful Pals to farming the most lucrative resources for crafting. Players can even explore the entirety of the Palpagos Islands in style, though they may come across one of the game's various dungeons while doing so.

The dungeons of Palworld are unique points of interest that house various chests. Each one offers some seriously good loot, along with Alpha Pals that players can take on. There are over 100 dungeons in Palworld , which can be found across every corner of the Palpagos Islands. Though these dungeons can be found in nearly every corner of the map, their precise locations are often quite hard to come across. Here are the locations of every dungeon in Palworld.

Forgotten Island & Ice Wind Island

The Forgotten Island and the Ice Wind Island are home to six Isolated Island Cavern dungeons , all of which are level 13 . Here is a breakdown of where exactly players can find each one:

item.title: EA Sports College Football 25 Release Time & Date
item.description:
After a painstakingly long wait, fans of college football now have a brand new title to sink their teeth into after a decade. In EA Sports College Football 25 , players will get a fresh look at the beloved sports title that had an almost cult following. It has a lot to live up to, given how well received the previous game was, so many fans are eager to get their hands on it as soon as possible.

Thankfully, the wait is all but over, but those wanting to jump right into the ultimate college football experience will need to know exactly when they can get access to College Football 25 . For this information, simply follow this guide that contains the release date and time for EA Sports College Football 25 .

When Does EA Sports College Football Release?

EA Sports College Football 25 is set for a full global release on July 19, 2024 , but players can get access to the game ahead of time if they fulfill the requirements we've noted below. The game will be available on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S. While the exact time for the full release hasn't been confirmed, players can expect that it will likely be available from 12:00am local time.

College Football 25 aims to provide you with the ultimate college football experience, with over 1,000 players on the game's roster and a host of different game modes. Whether you want to take your team to a championship as a coach in Dynasty mode, take control of a college player in Road to Glory mode, or build your dream team of collegiate talent in Ultimate Team, there's something for everyone.

How to Play College Football 25 Early

If July 19 simply cannot come soon enough, then the good news is that you can play College Football 25 ahead of time with the right edition of the game. If you purchase the Deluxe Edition, you will get access to College Football 25 from July 16, 2024 , three days before the game's full global release. While early access is confirmed for July 16, you will be able to download the game early, however it isn't confirmed if the download time means you can play as soon as it's done. With that said, College Football 25 will be available for download at early access from the following time, according to your time zone:

Time Zone

Release Time

Los Angeles (PDT)

July 15, 2024, at 1pm

New York (EDT)

July 15, 2024, at 4pm

London (BST)

July 15, 2024, at 9pm

Berlin (CEST)

July 15, 2024, at 10pm

Tokyo (JST)

July 16, 2024, at 5am

Sydney (AEST)

July 16, 2024, at 7am

Auckland (NZST)

July 16, 2024, at 9am

How To Preload College Football 25

If you purchase EA Sports College Football 25 ahead of its release time, you will be able to download it prior to its release, so you don't have to wait for the download to launch the game. Preloading is available 48 hours before the release, so be sure to check your console for download availability so you can have the game ready in time for its official release.
